name: Kailash Gayari
summary: Experienced developer with 5+ years in Angular, React, Node, and Docker. Turning ideas into scalable products.

about.description: I'm a software engineer who professionally crafts frontend and full-stack applications — and passionately rides bikes, travels, and explores new technologies. With a strong foundation in software engineering and an eye for detail, I enjoy writing clean, maintainable code that brings ideas to life. Whether it’s building scalable web interfaces or exploring the open road on two wheels, I bring energy, curiosity, and commitment to everything I do.

projects.title: NStream Connect (IoT Entertainment System)
projects.description: A Raspberry Pi-based device installed in buses and trains offering offline streaming of movies, music, and series via SD card to user devices over local Wi-Fi.

projects.title: NStream Admin Portal
projects.description: Admin dashboard for NStream Connect to manage media content, view analytics, device statuses, and handle remote configurations.

projects.title: Sosha (Design Tool like Canva)
projects.description: A graphic design web app similar to Canva, allowing users to create designs for social media and promotions using Fabric.js with drag-and-drop, layers, and export support.

projects.title: Sosha Admin Panel
projects.description: Admin portal for Sosha to manage templates, categories, assets, and review user-generated designs for approval and platform publication.

projects.title: Corporate Website
projects.description: Fully responsive, SEO-optimized business website developed with a lightweight CMS and deployed on static hosting platforms.

projects.title: Vipra App
projects.description: A mobile platform tailored for the Vipra community offering Matrimony, Job Portal, and Business Listings with a modern UI and secure backend.

projects.title: Amal E-Commerce
projects.description: Middle East-focused online store with full-stack development of search, filtering, cart, and category management features.

projects.title: QR Code Scanner & Rotation Detection
projects.description: App to scan QR codes and determine their rotation/orientation based on finder patterns; supports categorization and real-time detection.

projects.title: Mobile Face Authentication
projects.description: Standalone face authentication module developed for secure access, later integrated into larger client apps.
